column4: Hello, i got a question, i just installed unbuntu. worked fine, then it said needed to do some updates.. so i did them then it reboot comp, now when i try to boot up it brings me to this black screen where i can just type commands something like grub how i fix this?
do you get any kind of error message when you boot up?
it was working fine til i did the updates it asked me. not only boots to that black screen and i can type bunch of commands...
